name: olapscript

scripts.appscript: cat src/column.js src/timestamp.js src/expr.js src/aggr.js src/parser.js src/table.js > olapscript.gs
scripts.validate: cat src/column.js src/timestamp.js src/expr.js src/aggr.js src/parser.js src/table.js | diff -q - olapscript.gs

description: An OLAP engine for Google App Script
author: Richard Wesley
